contents.text: Thank you for calling Kyokan, your East Bay blockchain development and financial services agency making blockchain accessible to everyone on Earth.
For sales or partnership inquiries, press 1.
To discuss a new development project, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our project consultation team.

navigationGoals: Discuss timeline and budget for a new blockchain development project.
I’d like to discuss building a blockchain-based credential system for military training records.
Discuss a new blockchain development project for a cross-chain DApp with your project consultation team.
I’d like to talk to someone about starting a new blockchain development project and get guidance on next steps.
Discuss building a custom blockchain solution to manage my experimental physics data.

contents.text: To inquire about partnership opportunities, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our partnership team.

navigationGoals: Explore strategic partnership opportunities with Kyokan.
I want to explore partnering to integrate financial services into a veterans support platform.
Explore strategic partnership opportunities to integrate your blockchain SDK into our fintech platform.
I’m interested in exploring a partnership with your company to bring blockchain services to my small business.
Explore a partnership with Kyokan to integrate blockchain into my university research project.

contents.text: For developer support and technical assistance, press 2.
If you need API integration help, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our API support engineers.

navigationGoals: Get technical assistance integrating Kyokan’s blockchain API into our system.
I need assistance integrating your blockchain API into my nonprofit’s veterans benefits app.
Get API integration assistance for your blockchain services within our microservices architecture.
I need help integrating your blockchain API into my simple application—I’m not very technical and would appreciate step-by-step assistance.
Get assistance integrating Kyokan’s blockchain API into my physics simulation code.

contents.text: For blockchain security and compliance questions, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our security and compliance specialists.

navigationGoals: Clarify security standards and compliance requirements for Kyokan’s blockchain solutions.
I have security and compliance questions about handling veteran data on your blockchain solution.
Schedule a smart contract security audit and compliance consultation for our upcoming token launch.
I have questions about blockchain security standards and compliance requirements for my project and need clear explanations.
Ask about security best practices and compliance standards for storing scientific data on the blockchain.
